comentario: Superb hotel, great renovation and and very charming welcome !!
Always been cleaned by staff & not to noisy at night.
Perfect location, friendly staff and fun decorating.
Lovely location in a quiet complex with great views

Me and my family felt like at home during our stay; all what we needed was in place. People servicing the apartment were at our disposal to bring anything missing and answer all our questions. We highly recommend.
best Apartment in Town, very clean and the houseowner is very nice. we loved to stay there. very nice sunset view and you can even see the akropolis from the Apartment. we will come back for sure.
